text:
@IvankaTrump How about watching 
One World: At Home Together 

and acknowledge the healthcare workers who wish they could be at home doing shadow puppets with their children

but instead are risking their own health working to save lives from Coronavirus #ToneDeafMuch?

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
